localResource.name: VM_Name
localResource.label: VM Name
localResource.queryString: SELECT distinct o.historyId as historyId, o.deleteDate as deleteDate, CASE WHEN o.deleteDate IS NULL THEN o.vmName ELSE (o.vmName || ' (Removed on ' || cast(deleteDate as string) || ')') END as vmNameIc, o.vmId as vmId FROM V23VmConfigurationView as o where o.historyId = (SELECT max(a.historyId) FROM V23VmConfigurationView as a WHERE o.vmId = a.vmId) AND o.clusterId in (SELECT h.clusterId FROM V23ClusterConfigurationView as h WHERE cast(h.datacenterId as string) = $P{P_DataCenter_ID}) AND cast(o.clusterId as string) = CASE WHEN cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as string) = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' then cast(o.clusterId as string) ELSE cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as string) END AND o.vmType = CASE WHEN $P{P_VM_Type} = -1 THEN o.vmType WHEN $P{P_VM_Type} IS NULL THEN o.vmType ELSE $P{P_VM_Type} END order by o.deleteDate DESC
